metadata.description: a idle incremental game about coffee_tycoon_5

description: Step into the bustling world of coffee_tycoon_5, where your coffee shop runs itself! Manage your team of baristas as they serve customers and earn money. Upgrade your shop to increase efficiency and profits in this engaging idle game.
page_body:
# Welcome to Coffee Tycoon 5

## Game Lore
In the heart of the city, your coffee shop has become the talk of the town. As the owner, you've automated the process, allowing your skilled baristas to serve the ever-growing crowd of coffee lovers. Can you turn your humble caf√© into a coffee empire?

## How to Play
- **Objective**: Earn money by serving coffee to customers.
- **Gameplay**: Customers appear at the counters, and AI-controlled baristas automatically take orders, prepare drinks, and serve them.
- **Currency**: Earn money each time a customer is served. Use this money to purchase upgrades.

## Upgrades
- **Number of Baristas**: Increase the number of orders processed simultaneously.
- **Barista Speed**: Make your baristas move faster between stations.
- **Coffee Machine Efficiency**: Reduce the time it takes to prepare drinks.
- **Additional Service Counters**: Serve more customers at once.
- **Coffee Price**: Increase the money earned per order.
- **Customer Attraction**: Decrease the time between customer appearances.

## Strategies
- Focus on upgrading barista speed and coffee machine efficiency early to maximize order processing.
- Balance your upgrades to ensure a steady flow of customers and quick service.
- Invest in additional service counters to handle peak times and increase your earnings.

Embark on your journey to become the ultimate coffee tycoon!
